content: Really great, honest read. And I’m glad I’m not alone on this. Last week I published my first piece on Medium and watched as, for an hour and a half, 1 person viewed (and failed to finish) my piece. I went to sleep, saying to myself “I suck”. I woke up to a number of reads and one comment that meant the world to me; “Keep telling stories, please.” Sometimes, we are own worse critics.
